Package src.helper

Class Helper

java.lang.Object
src.helper.Helper
public class Helper extends Object
Helper class to provide support functions for other classes

  • Method Details

    • readInt

      public static int readInt()
      Function to read an integer value from terminal

      Repeatedly tries to read an integer until an integer is actually being read. Keeps catching the exception InputMismatchException when invalid characters are entered

      Returns:
      The read integer entered in the terminal.

    • readInt

      public static int readInt(int min, int max)
      Function to read an integer value from terminal that within the specified minimum and maximum arguments.

      Repeatedly tries to read an integer until an integer within the specified range is actually being read.

      Keeps catching the exception InputMismatchException when invalid characters are entered.

      Keeps catching the exception OutOfRange when an integer entered is lesser than the minimum or greater than the maximum value specified as arguments.

      Parameters:
      min - minimum valid value that will be read and returned.
      max - maximum valid value that will be read and returned.
      Returns:
      The read integer entered in the terminal.

    • readDouble

      public static double readDouble()
      Function to read a double value from terminal.

      Repeatedly tries to read a double until a double is actually being read. Keeps catching the exception InputMismatchException when invalid characters are entered

      Returns:
      returns the read double entered in the terminal.

    • promptConfirmation

      public static boolean promptConfirmation(String message)
      Method to prompt confirmation from the user. Usually for confirmation of removing data
      Parameters:
      message - Message for confirmation prompt.
      Returns:
      true if user input 'yes'. Otherwise, false.

    • generateUniqueId

      public static <K, V> int generateUniqueId(HashMap<K,V> database)
      Method to generate unique id for hashMap key
      Type Parameters:
      K - Generic type for the key of the HashMap
      V - Generic type for the value of the HashMap
      Parameters:
      database - Hashmap object to reference
      Returns:
      A unique id for the database

    • setDate

      public static String setDate(boolean now)
      Method to set the date for either current date or user input date
      Parameters:
      now - true to return the current time. Otherwise, false to prompt user for new time.
      Returns:
      String object for the date in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm"

    • getDate

      public static LocalDateTime getDate(String date, DateTimeFormatter format)
      Method to parse a string date in a format
      Parameters:
      date - Date in string
      format - DateTimeFormatter object for formatting of dates
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime object after parsing the string date with the formatter

    • getTimeNow

      public static String getTimeNow()
      Method to get current date and time
      Returns:
      String object for the date in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm"

    • validateDate

      public static boolean validateDate(String date, DateTimeFormatter format)
      Method to validate date
      Parameters:
      date - Date in string
      format - DateTimeFormatter object for formatting of dates
      Returns:
      true if date is valid. Otherwise, false if the date is invalid (date is in the past)

    • LocalDateTimediff

      public static boolean LocalDateTimediff(String date)
      Method to check if the time difference of the input date and current time exceeds 1 hour (Hotel check in / check out checking)
      Parameters:
      date - Date in string
      Returns:
      true if the date does not exceed 1 hour. Otherwise, false.

    • calculateDaysElapsed

      public static long calculateDaysElapsed(String fromDate, String toDate)
      Method to calculate the days elapsed between two dates.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - From date in string.
      toDate - To date in string.
      Returns:
      Days difference of the two dates.

    • validateTwoDates

      public static boolean validateTwoDates(String fromDate, String toDate)
      Method to check if fromDate is earlier than toDate
      Parameters:
      fromDate - From date in string.
      toDate - To date in string.
      Returns:
      true if the fromDate is earlier than toDate. Otherwise, false

    • pressAnyKeyToContinue

      public static void pressAnyKeyToContinue()
      Method to pause the application and prompt user to press the ENTER key to continue using the app.

    • clearScreen

      public static void clearScreen()
      Method to clear the screen of the terminal for user experience and neat interface.
